text.title: Rare megamouth shark found dead in Pio Duran, Philippines
text.head: Rare megamouth shark found dead in Pio Duran, Philippines
Sources

list.item: "Rare megamouth shark dies in Albay shore" — GMA Network , January 30, 2015
Abby Phillip. "Mysterious megamouth shark washes ashore in the Philippines" — The Washington Post , January 29, 2015
Heather Saul. "Rare megamouth shark washes up onshore in the Philippines" — The Independent , January 29, 2015
